actions.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (UT) amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 243 (Roll no. 406).

description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 110-165 to delay the acquisition of any new land for the Carl Sandburg Home National Historic Site until after deferred maintenance has been completed at the site.
purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 110-165 to delay the acquisition of any new land for the Carl Sandburg Home National Historic Site until after deferred maintenance has been completed at the site.
